meta.source: Intersect Budget Committee — 2025 Cardano Blockchain Ecosystem Budget Proposal
meta.notes: All figures indicative; subject to ADA price, community feedback, on-chain approvals. Input from 100+ members across committees/WGs.

on_chain_status.smart_contract_framework: Sundae Labs Treasury + Vendor Contracts with Oversight Committee multi-sig

buckets.name: Core Budget
buckets.description: Ongoing development and maintenance of Cardano blockchain.

breakdown.item: Core Maintenance (IOE call-off Feb–Jul, open tender Jul+)
breakdown.notes: Integration & rollout ~35%, core maint ~40%, support ~15%, ops ~10%
Ouroboros Leios, UTxO LMDB/LSM, Plutus improvements, node improvements, etc.
Requested by TSC; may be handled by Budget Committee
50 open-source projects: half Core Cardano, half community-nominated
Bounties for features on qualified projects
Part-time roles: N. America, Africa, India, Vietnam
Legal, outreach, tooling, partnerships
Conferences, hackathons, meetups
24/7 monitoring, 48hr response, 7-day fix target
Travel and reimbursement

breakdown.item: Google Summer of Code or Equivalent
breakdown.notes: Mentorship program
Estimated remaining allocation

buckets.name: Research Budget
buckets.description: Long-term R&D, roadmap vision, product strategy.

breakdown.notes: Roadmap items, vision facilitation

buckets.name: Governance Support Budget
buckets.description: Constitution stewardship, elections, DRep support, budget management.

breakdown.notes: DRep compensation/training/tooling, CC admin/legal/remuneration, SPO training, ADA holder education
Constitution ratification, CC elections, on-chain voting tools, events/remuneration
Future governance processes, annual state-of-governance report, regional events
Budget process management, audits, financial reporting

buckets.name: Growth & Marketing Budget
buckets.description: Ecosystem growth, marketing strategies, community events.

breakdown.notes: Ecosystem events, community growth, marketing pulse reports

buckets.name: Innovation Budget
buckets.description: Member engagement, community hubs, innovation programs.

breakdown.notes: Global hub network (Brazil, Sri Lanka, etc.)
Member services, offerings, retention

buckets.name: Funding Intersect (Administrator)
buckets.description: Intersect operational costs as treasury administrator, replacing 5% Delivery Assurance fee.

breakdown.notes: Covers all admin, staff, capabilities, member services

vendor_disbursements.transparency_note: Nearly half the entire approved budget goes to one entity (IOG). Core Dev passed with 73.93% DRep support. CF DRep abstained on Research citing lack of strategic clarity.

proposals: OSC Budget — Paid Open Source Model

vendor_disbursements.status: mixed — most contracted, individual amounts not yet disclosed
vendor_disbursements.transparency_note: Individual contract amounts for non-IOG vendors not publicly itemized yet. Combined remainder = ₳264M - ₳156M confirmed.

oversight_committee.role: Independent verification of key smart contract actions. Multi-sig authorization for fund movements. No single entity can modify contracts unilaterally.
oversight_committee.transparency_note: Sundae Labs built the treasury contracts AND sits on the Oversight Committee — dual role noted.

expired_proposals.name: MLabs — Research towards Tooling for Elliptic Curves
Ledger App Rewrite (Vacuum Labs)
expired_proposals.reason: CF abstained; overlap with maintenance proposal

expired_proposals.name: Expanding Stablecoin / Fiat Ramps (Anzens)
expired_proposals.reason: Viewed as business venture, not public good

expired_proposals.name: Ecosystem Exchange Listing / Market Making (Flowdesk)
expired_proposals.reason: Poor cost justification; normalized profit ratio very low
